Text: Hi HeroMaster. My AV tells me the executable is infected with Ciffrax (or smth. similar). I know your torrents are clean, and theta never made my AV freak out before, so can you confirm the file is clean?
@light_down I tested it and it was clean as a fiddle, I always say disable your antivirus and block firewall, after that enjoy playing :)

If you get alerts or warnings from your AV its either doing that because this file isn't used very much on the web and unknown or because it's a crack.

theta release(installer) is always flagged as virus. so far, i cant find traces of harmfull process. nevertheless, i would recommend to install using sandboxie and then copy the installed app to your common games directory. the games are clean. its the installer.
